headline: COLUMBUS® Craft Meats Expands Deli Portfolio with First Standalone Pepperoni Product
summary: COLUMBUS® Craft Meats, a leading brand in premium salumi, has launched its first standalone pepperoni deli product: COLUMBUS® Uncured Pepperoni. A brand rooted in Italian American tradition, the COLUMBUS ® brand recognized an opportunity to bring bold, elevated pepperoni to the deli, crafted for consumers craving premium flavor and versatility.
